r.s: Event-driven asynchronous and concurrent networking engine with high performance for PHP.
r.d: Event-driven asynchronous and concurrent networking engine with high performance for PHP. - event-driven - coroutine - asynchronous non-blocking - multi-thread reactor - multi-process worker - multi-protocol - millisecond timer - built-in tcp/http/websocket/http2 server - coroutine tcp/http/websocket client - coroutine mysql client - coroutine redis client - coroutine read/write file system - coroutine dns lookup - support IPv4/IPv6/UnixSocket/TCP/UDP - support SSL/TLS encrypted transmission
r.n:
Notice: v4.4.x is no longer the main maintenance branch, bug fixes only when necessary
Fixed --- * Merged all the bugfix patches from v4.5.x
